org.pdfbox.ant
Class PDFToTextTask

java.lang.Object

          org.pdfbox.ant.PDFToTextTask
public class PDFToTextTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task

This is an ant task that will allow pdf documents to be converted using an and task.
